deposit(uint256,uint256,address).details: Only tokens registered in GameRegistry with an amount greater than zero is valid for the deposit

distribute(uint256,uint256,address[],add.details: only maintainerTotal distribution amount of the tournament of the game must be equal to/less than the double amount deposited in the tournament of the game due to the bonus

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePlatformFee(address,uint16).details: Only ownerAllow zero recipient address only of fee is also zero

totalDeposit.details: Game ID -> Tournament ID -> Token Address -> Total Deposit Amount excluding fees

totalDistribution.details: Game ID -> Tournament ID -> Token Address -> Total Distribution Amount excluding fees

userdoc.notice: This manages the token deposit/distribution from/to the users
